@EnvAgency won‚Äôt disclose where 100ktpa of UK waste is exported to in Bulgaria. I wonder if they know? The claim from the (criminal owned) exporters is cement kilns. The region has history - landfilling/burning imported waste in unabated power stations. https://t.co/nEravKGYg5
